Title: Soft Light
Plot: An experiment in dark matter accidentally turns a scientist's shadow into a deadly weapon that can unzip a person's molecules if they are touched by it.
GuestStars: Tony Shalhoub, Kevin McNulty, Kate Twa, Nathaniel Deveaux, Robert Rozen, Donna Yamamoto, Forbes Angus, Guyle Frazier, Steve Bacic, Craig Brunanski
